column1: 10000010$The Winged Dragon of Ra$$DIVINE$[Divine-Beast/effect]$$$$$10$0$0$$$$Cannot be Special Summoned. Requires 3 Tributes to Normal Summon (cannot be Normal Set). This card's Normal Summon cannot be negated. When Normal Summoned
column2: other cards and effects cannot be activated. When this card is Normal Summoned: You can pay LP so that you only have 100 left; this card gains ATK/DEF equal to the amount of LP paid. You can pay 1000 LP
column3: then target 1 monster on the field; destroy that target.$$$$$
